alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN CROW WING COUNTY THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Merrifield, or near Brainerd, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Merrifield around 430 PM CDT. Brainerd around 440 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ironton, Upper South Long Lake and South Long Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
